items.sentence: I wish that Tom wouldn't keep telling everybody that I'm his brother.
Tom said he thought that it would be a waste of time to study French.
Tom said that he thought it would be a waste of time to study French.
Tom stood there envying the other boys who were all riding tricycles.
It rained heavily, and consequently the baseball game was called off.
Do you think that it's fair to judge people by the company they keep?
If the statement is true, then we will have to accept the conclusion.
If anyone calls me up while I'm away, tell them I'll be back by five.
Don't you think it's rude to give people such a curt reply like that?
I can't think of any other way of getting him to accept our proposal.
